alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 12:58PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Henderson, southern Benton, McNairy, southern Carroll, Hardin, northeastern Chester and Decatur Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 1258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Bargerton to near Jacks Creek to 6 miles east of Big Hill Pond State Park. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Savannah, Henderson, Selmer, Camden, Pickwick Landing State Park, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Adamsville, New Johnsonville, Decaturville, Sardis, Pickwick Dam, Reagan, Bargerton, Jacks Creek, Blue Goose, Mifflin and Wildersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Hardin; Henderson; McNairy
